title: Bug 123036 - Duplicate Data Storage Issue in Reports
description: This bug report pertains to a data duplication problem in reports where data is stored redundantly, resulting in two instances of the same data.
OB: The observed behavior is that data is currently stored twice.
EB: The expected behavior is that the instance stored by the content stream should not be duplicated, ensuring that data is not redundantly stored in reports.
SR:
To reproduce this bug:
1. Generate or access a report.
2. Observe that the data is redundantly stored, with two instances in the report.
